original_text: Namely, five lords of the Philistines, and all the Canaanites, and the Sidonians, and the Hivites that dwelt in mount Lebanon, from mount Baalhermon unto the entering in of Hamath.
korean_text: 블레셋의 다섯 군주들과 모든 가나안 족속과 시돈 족속과 바알 헤르몬 산에서부터 하맛 입구까지 레바논 산에 거주하는 히위 족속이라

sentences.original_text: Namely, five lords of the Philistines,
and the Hivites that dwelt in mount Lebanon,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레바논 산에 거주하는 헷 사람들과,

sentences.original_text: from mount Baalhermon unto the entering in of Hamath.
